Tucson sits up again.  The news disturbs him yet he keeps calm about it.  H=
is reaction is a quick narrow of his optics which then again change to a ne=
utral expression.  He pauses before replying.

" I do remember Elita.  I wo=
rked with her on occasion.  Yet I found I could never keep up with her in V=
ehicle mode.  She'd always call me slow poke.  Although I never did mind th=
at because I'd call her Speedy right back."

He chuckles for a moment and t=
hen turns a tad more serious.

" All right, for me, fun's over.  As an Auto=
bot I always stick by my comrades no matter what happens and no matter what=
 dangers lie ahead for me in the process.  Rodimus is still an Autobot no m=
atter how much he may have been tampered with.  I'm willing to do anything =
in my power to see to it that he's found and hopefully try to bargain with =
Hydras to restore him back to his normal self, if he has not damaged any of=
 his memory components."

He narrows his eyes.

"If I can't bargain with hi=
m, I swear by the name of Primus I will FIGHT him for Rodimus even if it me=
ans endangering my spark to do it. No one tampers with an Autobot and gets =
away with it!"

He slams his fist down on the bench, as it cracks beneath h=
is power driven fist.

"Kenzo, how soon can I be repaired fully?"

 put out a call but no one had replied.  He

that he may be the sole surviving Autobot and

mainstay of Cybertron.  He could hear Kenzo in

us to know if his leader, Rodimus Prime, and his

ord Perseus on
> Atlantis.. Before I - met you, I - was helping Rodimus fen=

> attack.  I- got shot, and that was that.  I - don't re=
member anything else..

her Autobots still alive
> as well? I tried - to contact them but - got no =
response.  I'm - a bit

others still functioning?"
